mapper.insert: insert into item (title, category, price) values (#{title}, #{category}, #{price})
mapper.select: select postercid, title, category, price, insert_date from item where item_id = #{itemId}

select item_id, title, category, price, insert_date from item where 1 = 1
and (title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or category like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
order by insert_date desc
